name: Superdense Coding
description: Transmit 2 classical bits using 1 qubit and a pre-shared Bell pair (encodes message '11').
long_description: Superdense coding is the 'dual' of teleportation: it uses a shared entangled pair and a single qubit transmission to communicate 2 classical bits. Alice applies local Pauli operations to encode her 2-bit message, then sends her qubit to Bob. Bob performs a Bell measurement to decode the message. This circuit encodes '11'.

references.title: Bennett & Wiesner (1992). Communication via One- and Two-Particle Operators. PRL 69, 2881

author: OpenQC Community
